reference: Volume One, Issue Six, Phile 1 of 13
title: Index
historical_context: This is one of the early issues of Phrack, a significant hacking zine that contributed to the hacker culture in the 1980s.
target_audience: Hackers, phreakers, and those interested in early computer culture.
short_summary: The index provides a brief overview of the contents of Phrack Inc. VI, listing the articles included in this issue.
summary: The index serves as a navigational tool for readers of Phrack Inc. VI, detailing the various articles and their authors. It highlights the collaborative nature of the zine, showcasing contributions from multiple writers, each bringing their unique insights into the hacking and phreaking community. The index is essential for readers looking to quickly locate specific topics of interest within the issue.
additional_notes: This index sets the stage for the diverse range of articles that follow, reflecting the interests and concerns of the hacker community during this period.
